title: Guitar World - Guitar Heroes - The Very Best Of Guitar World Vid

With more than 90 minutes of lessons and columns with TAB in our digital booklet, our Guitar Heroes DVD lets the guitar gods show you how to jam. And you wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be able to find this DVD anywhere else but here!

The Guitar Heroes DVD instructors and content include:

Yngwie Malmsteen: How to Play Fast
